meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Miles Neff Pat Nilsson Dan Green Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #372.

td.p: Miles Neff, a television cameraman from Long Beach, California
Pat Nilsson, a travel writer from San Diego, California
Dan Green, a teacher from Las Vegas, Nevada

tr.td: 20TH CENTURY
CASABLANCA
(Alex: The category has to do with the film.)
SPORTS DATES
PETROLEUM
GOLDEN OLDIES
POTPOURRI
